settings.heading: New Belgium Brewing x Spiceology
settings.content: These new New Belgium Brewing beer-infused blends were carefully curated to inspire friends and family to come together and experiment with flavor with innovative profiles, including Citrus Ginger, Habanero Grapefruit, Hot Honey, Moroccan Grill, Summer BBQ, and Sweet & Sour.

settings.heading: About New Belgium Brewing
settings.text: Spiceology has teamed up with beer icon New Belgium Brewing to introduce the 2021 edition of beer-infused blends and take your barbecue plans by storm; this line follows Spiceologyâ€™s 2020 launch of fan favorite beer-infused blends made in collaboration with over-the-fire cooking expert Derek Wolf.
